entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
